title: Get a Merlin 2-in-1 Vacuum Cleaner bundle for just £45!
content:
Vacuuming can be an arduous task, especially when you’re trying to reach high ceilings and awkward corners. But that’s where the Merlin 2-in-1 Vacuum Cleaner can help. With its removable handle, you can seamlessly convert it from an upright vacuum into a lightweight, hand-held device. And while it may weigh a mere 2kg, thanks to its 6m cable and 850 watts of power, it will easily remove ingrained dirt, pet hair and dust from all over your home – and even inside your car. Merlin vacuums work best when used with a HEPA filter, and with this exclusive offer, if you enter the code: VAC21 at checkout, you’ll get the Merlin 2-in-1 Vacuum Cleaner and a Dual HEPA Filter Set for just £45, plus £4.95 p&p!

Claim offer now

Note: We negotiate hard to bring you great offers and the best prices in our online deals. We receive a commission from the retailer for each completed purchase and this income helps us to continue to be able to offer you our high-quality content free of charge.

The Merlin 2-in-1 Vacuum Cleaner comes in four vibrant colours – purple, blue, green and gold. Each style boasts the same innovative features and accessories, including:

  • Dual HEPA Filtration System – HEPA filters are allergy-friendly and may help to improve the air circulation in your home.
  • Transparent dust collector – this is an easier and cheaper alternative to standard dust bags, as it won’t ever need replacing. Once full, simply remove and clean, then reinsert into your vacuum.
  • Three-piece accessory kit – with these interchangeable nozzles and brushes, you’ll be able to vacuum everything from hard surfaces to soft carpets and upholstery.

Ready to take advantage of this great deal?

Offer ends 21/06/21. Cannot be used in conjunction with any other discounts or offers.

Claim offer now

author: Steve Newell
